title: Lost & Found
description:
Never trust a lone wolf.




Federal Agent Etta Mitchell has no choice but to go on the run when her latest undercover case goes sideways. With dangerous criminals tracking her, she also has no choice but to trust the stranger she’s suddenly forced to share a cabin with. All she wants is to wrap up her case and be on her way back home. But casualties are inevitable—and if she’s not careful her heart might be one.Jackson Fahey has secrets of his own. Such as an unparalleled sense of smell that makes his new houseguest nearly impossible to resist. There’s also his double life as a wolf, which he has no plans to mention to the very suspicious human in his living room. Once she’s gone, he can go back to his regular life as an unapproachable mountain man. Just the way he liked it—until now.Etta can tell there’s more to Jackson than meets the eye, but when she finds out the Fahey family secret? All bets are off.Oh, and Etta? She’s definitely not Jackson’s mate.Yeah... definitely not.

Lost & Found is the first book of a duet. The second book, Finders Keepers is available now.
author: Maria C. Bane
